author: taylor
msg: changed the logo to point to home

author: morciuch
msg: Plugging a security hole which allowed to display ANY portlet in maximized mode regardless of user's security.

author: taylor
msg: problems with referencing PSML resources with hard-coded ids such as 100, in that they conflicted with ids in the current page.
This was giving me some real headaches, so I removed all the common ids from any psml that may be referenced

author: morciuch
msg: Added functionality in BaseJetspeedLink to generate link to an existing portlet. This link will display portlet in specified mode (maximized, print friendly, etc). The portlet to link to may be identified via its js_peid or portlet name. If portlet name is used, its js_peid is derived from the first portlet with matching name.
In Velocity, use $jslink tool. In JSP, use portletlink tag which leverages of off JetspeedLink.
Updated "JSLINK Examples" and "JSP1_1andJetspeedTagLib" portlets with examples of this functionality.
